Class OfficerController

Object
OfficerController
public class OfficerController extends Object
Controller for handling actions available to HDB Officers, including project registration, registration status checks, project viewing, flat assignment, and receipt generation.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Javier

  • Constructor Details

    • OfficerController

      public OfficerController(ApplicationController applicationController)
      Constructs the OfficerController with access to the application controller.
      Parameters:
      applicationController - The application controller used to handle assignments and queries.

  • Method Details

    • reqToHandleProject

      public boolean reqToHandleProject(HDBOfficer officer, String projectName)
      Allows an officer to register to handle a specific project. Officer cannot register if they already have an active registration for an ongoing project, or if they have applied as an applicant for the same project.
      Parameters:
      officer - The officer requesting to register.
      projectName - The name of the project.
      Returns:
      True if registration was successful; false otherwise.

    • viewRegistrationStatus

      public HDBOfficer.RegistrationStatus viewRegistrationStatus(HDBOfficer officer, String projectName)
      Returns the registration status of the officer for a specific project.
      Parameters:
      officer - The officer to query.
      projectName - The project name to check.
      Returns:
      The registration status for the specified project.

    • viewAssignedProjectDetails

      public Project viewAssignedProjectDetails(HDBOfficer officer)
      Returns the project object that the officer is currently assigned to.
      Parameters:
      officer - The officer requesting project details.
      Returns:
      The assigned project, or null if not found.

    • assignFlatToApplicant

      public void assignFlatToApplicant(HDBOfficer officer, String applicantNric)
      Assigns a flat to a successful applicant under the officer's project. Also triggers receipt generation.
      Parameters:
      officer - The officer performing the assignment.
      applicantNric - The NRIC of the applicant.

    • generateReceipt

      public void generateReceipt(HDBOfficer officer, String applicantNric)
      Generates a receipt for a flat booking made by a specified applicant. Confirms the application exists and belongs to the officerâ€™s assigned project.
      Parameters:
      officer - The officer generating the receipt.
      applicantNric - The NRIC of the applicant.
